General.Name: Innovative Rfk SpA
General.Description: Innovative-RFK S.p.A. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in startup, emerging growth, and growth capital investments in medium-sized companies. The firm also makes fund of fund investments in private equity funds. It prefers to invest in the biomedical systems, microcredit for SMEs, information technology, high tech sector, and innovative solutions for different industries. It typically invests in companies based in Italy. It invests up to "3 million ($3.54 million) in companies with enterprise value up to "50 million ($58.96 million), sales value up to "50 million ($58.96 million) and EBITDA up to "5 million ($5.90 million). The firm invests through its personal capital. The firm seeks to invests either in either minority or majority. The firm prefers to exit its investments within 18-24 months through IPO. Innovative-RFK S.p.A. was founded in 2017 and it is based in Milan, Italy.

2.Name: Mr. Massimo  Laccisaglia
2.Title: Co-Founder & VP of Board of Directors
